item.title: How to configure NXLog
item.description: How to configure NXLog Windows Edit the nxlog.conf file inside C:\Program Files (x86)\nxlog\conf At the bottom of the notepad will be some commented out lines that are similar to the lines below, remove the hashes so they arent commented out and make sure the output is correctly configured to the syslog server’s IP using the correct Module (TCP/UDP) and Port. When you edit the nxlog.

item.title: How to install NXLog
item.description: How to install NXLog Windows Download NXLog from the website - NXLog Downloads Install using the .exe you just downloaded, if you choose a custom install path make sure you remember where it is. Once you have configured the nxlog.conf start the nxlog service in the services applet. If you have any issues there is a log file in the INSTALL_PATH\data\nxlog.txt this should give some information on what the issue is.
